name: PaymentCardVerificationRequest.Reason
desc: The reason for the verification request.

items.name: case lookUp
items.desc: Verify the payment card to look up a past transaction.

items.name: case openTab
items.desc: Provide the card information to guarantee payment of a bill later.

items.name: case saveCard
items.desc: Save the card information for later.

items.name: static func == (PaymentCardVerificationRequest.Reason, PaymentCardVerificationRequest.Reason) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are equal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of this value by feeding them into the given hasher.
